pages.title: Fermentation Barrel
pages.text: The fermentation barrel is used to ferment ales, lagers, wines, ciders, and mead. Each of these beverages will apply a different effect upon drinking.$(br2)Place the base fluid into the barrel with the appropriate yeast to produce a fermented product.$(br)The finished product can be extracted with a glass bottle.
The fermentation barrel can fit up to four buckets of fluid, but takes longer to process the more fluid is present.
